Row.Text: Retains 50% of the [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness benefits from a Luxury Resource if your last copy of it is traded away.
Dutch East India Company
+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith per city with an adjacent unimproved Forest. Bonus increases to +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith in Cities with 3 or more adjacent unimproved Forest tiles.
Druidic Lore
[COLOR_MAGENTA] Palace product +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and the Shrine costs half as much [ENDCOLOR] Choose one more Belief than normal when you found a Religion.
Patriarchate of Constantinople
Gain 90 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with a Great Person gift to a City-State. When declaring friendship, Sweden and their friend gain a +10% boost to Great Person generation.
Nobel Prize
Raze Cities at double speed. Borrow City names from other in-game Civs. Start with Animal Husbandry technology. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production per Pasture.
Scourge of God
Can spend [ICON_GOLD] Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for 5 turns.
Diplomatic Marriage
All coastal Cities get a free Harbor. Units may cross mountains after the first Great General is earned, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a mountain.
Phoenician Heritage
After researching Theology, receive a bonus Great Person at the end of every Maya Long Count calendar cycle (every 394 years). Each bonus person can only be chosen once.
The Long Count
Combat bonus (+20%) when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than Ethiopia.
Spirit of Adwa
Receive triple [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities. Land units gain the War Canoe and Amphibious promotions, strengthening them while embarked.
Seven Cities of Gold
[ICON_GOLD] Gold bonus for discovering a Natural Wonder (bonus enhanced if first to discover it). [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, and tile yields from Natural Wonders doubled.
